title: Interpretation of dreams: My husband married Ali by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband was married to me is one of the visions that carry a large number of meanings, knowing that when one immediately sees these types of dreams, the meanings they carry are searched for because they are ambiguous dreams that cause anxiety in the souls of the dreamers, and today through our website we mention the most important interpretations of the vision. I dreamed that my husband was married to me. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is marrying her, this is evidence that she is seriously jealous of all the women in the world and cannot bear the idea of ​​being with another woman, even if she is under it. The name is friendship. By seeing my husband married to Ali with jewels, the dream is only a reflection of what is happening in the dreamer’s subconscious, and it is better to get rid of all these doubts because they have nothing to do with reality. In the event that a married woman sees that her husband is marrying a woman of unparalleled beauty and elegance Ordinary, this is an indication that he will obtain an important position in the near future and generally achieve great success in his life, which will prompt him to move. With a high standard of living and full of luxury. In general, the interpretation also depends on the appearance of the woman he married, if she is very beautiful, evidence of his achieving all his life goals and overcoming all the difficulties he is going through at the present time. If the young woman’s hair is long and thick, then the vision is good, as she will achieve many achievements in her life, knowing that the coming days will send him many good things. If a married woman sees that her husband is marrying a bald woman, unfortunately the vision does not bode well at all, because It leads to major financial crises that the person with the vision will face and the accumulation of debts on his shoulders, and you will not feel it. Peace for a long time. I dreamed that my husband married Ali to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing my husband marry Ali in a dream is one of the visions that carry many interpretations of his vision, and here are the most prominent of these interpretations: If a married woman sees that she is quarreling with her husband because of his marriage to her and her psychological state is bad, The dream indicates that she is not well in reality and does not find anyone to help her. If a married woman sees that her husband has married her and cries loudly, this is evidence of worsening problems between her and her husband, especially if the crying is loud. But if her crying is without pity. The vision here is a promising dream that symbolizes the ease of material and professional matters for the dreamer and her husband and the achievement of everything her heart desires. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is marrying her, but the appearance of his new wife is not clear, this indicates that her husband’s conditions in general are poor in terms of Financial, health and career will never be stable. The days will come with many crises. A husband marrying his wife in a dream with tears and slaps is a warning of the coming of a large number of problems, a great financial loss, and living in a state of distress. Ibn Sirin said that the husband’s marriage to his wife in a dream and the dreamer was very happy with her husband, and this symbolizes an increase in Big in money. I dreamed that my husband married Ali to a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a green dress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a green dress in a dream. Dresses are among the details that a girl wears on occasions and in happy moments. The color and shape of the dress are among the things that girls want to choose carefully. Each color of dresses has its own meaning and occasion. In general, seeing a dress in a dream is considered a promising dream. And the happy ones that people see in their dreams, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of a green dress in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green dress in a dream: In general, the green color indicates agricultural lands and gardens and carries a happy complexion with the acquisition of great wealth and abundance of money, and we find that it is strong evidence. On the closeness of man to God and that he is among the righteous. The servants of religion, and they are characterized by piety and piety. Loose green clothes indicate the dreamer’s good intentions in dealing with the people around him, and indicate the good morals that the dreamer has. In the words of Ibn Sirin, we find that this vision indicates the abundance of the dreamer’s goodness, so the green dress is a garment People of Paradise. This dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve his dreams and goals and begin a happy life. It may indicate marriage and a green dress may represent inheritance. In general, green indicates stability and balance of the dreamer’s psychological state. If a woman sees herself wearing a delicate green dress, this indicates the pride of the girl and her family. If a woman sees a green dress in a dream and her body is torn and damaged But she can repair it, as this is a sign of magic that can affect a woman, and if the dress cannot be repaired, this indicates the woman’s impotence. To have a male. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green dress in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman wears a long green dress, this means that the girl does with her everything that pleases God Almighty, and this dream symbolizes her constant closeness and love for God Almighty and is evidence of good morals, religion, and good behavior. the girl. purity. It expresses her longevity. When a girl buys green clothes in a dream and wears a green veil over them, this indicates that a good man will marry her soon and will be distinguished by religion and good morals. This vision indicates distinction, success, and distinction in studies, especially if the girl is single and still at the university level. If an unmarried woman sees a light green dress, it means that she will get married soon. In general, this dream shows the strong faith and righteousness that characterizes a single woman and is a sign that God will cover her and bring her goodness and blessings and she will have abundant luck. A new life, you will feel happy. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a short green dress for a single woman: This dream indicates obedience and worship of God by unmarried women, but in a simple way. It also symbolizes the sincere intention, morals, kindness, and good health of this single woman, and this vision can mean joy and feeling With happiness. In general, interpretations remain only possibilities and are weak, they rarely come true in real life and the dream rarely extends to real life

title: Interpretation of repeatedly seeing someone in a dream is psychology

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a person repeatedly in a dream. psychology. You will find it in this article on the encyclopedia website. You will also find the interpretation of this dream from the point of view of the most famous dream interpretation scholars. There are different interpretations of seeing a person repeatedly in a dream, and the interpretation varies according to the dreamer’s gender, age, health condition, and social and human circumstances. Materiality and other factors have a profound influence on interpretation. The science of dream interpretation is a broad and deep science, which is strange and impressive to many, but before considering the various interpretations, one must believe that all these interpretations are only the judgments of scientists and that it is all in the hands of scientists. . Knows the unseen. Interpretation of repeatedly seeing a person in a dream Psychology Psychologists believe that if the dreamer sees the same person in a dream more than once, this means that his subconscious mind is very busy with this person. If you always see a person in your dreams, this means that it is certain that this The person will have a significant impact on your life, which can be positive or negative, depending on the nature of the dream. It leaves a good impression on the soul, but if the influence of this person is negative in your life, then the dream will have a bad impression on the soul. If you see a person more than once, it means that there is a strong emotional bond between them in real life. Repeating a dream with different images is normal Extremely experienced by many people at different times and basically shows the dreamer's desire to communicate with this person in real life. The more you constantly think about someone and occupy your mind a lot, the more it will happen in your dream, as the dream translates what the subconscious wants. The health condition of close people affects You have to do a lot. If someone close to you is injured or sick, your subconscious mind is busy with him and thinks deeply about him and the details of his illness, which is why he is present in your sleep so often. If you pay great attention to someone and care about all his details and problems, then of course you will worry him and he will see him a lot in his dreams. Interpretation of recurring vision of a human being. In a dream from the point of view of dream interpretation scholarsDream interpretation scholars believe that seeing someone in a dream repeatedly is a strong indication that this person will undergo major changes in his life, and these changes can be in the personal, practical, or social aspects. If you see in many Sometimes one of your family members in your dreams, it means that you need to give them more attention and love and you must share it with them to know what is going on in their daily lives. If the dreamer sees his life partner in a dream more than once, this means that there are some disagreements, problems and judgments between them and he must He tries to resolve these differences and pay more attention to him. If the dreamer sees a person in a dream repeatedly, and the dream is scary and strange, this means that this person harbors feelings of resentment and hatred towards the dreamer, and the dreamer must be very careful and not trust him too quickly. Seeing the same person may indicate The person frequently refers to this person's dominance and desire to control him

title: Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about buying fish for a married woman and interpretation of a dream about selling fish for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman has many meanings. Seeing fish often expresses many good things that a person has in his life, but there are other meanings that can express bad events if a woman sees a fish in different circumstances, so let us get to know everything related to seeing it. In a dream from the point of view of scholars, interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman? Seeing a fish in a dream for a married woman means that happiness will come to her very soon, and it can also represent days of misery and unhappiness, so tell us when it represents That is good and when it is bad. A live fish that a woman sees in her dream expresses that the next is better (than God Almighty) If she is currently suffering from a financial crisis or if her husband has not found the appropriate job to help him with his and his family’s expenses, then a live fish playing in the water indicates On the arrival of a lot of money soon, or a prestigious job for the husband that brings him a large monthly salary. If she sees an aquarium and colorful fish playing in front of her, she will be blessed with an imminent pregnancy if she has a strong desire to have children or suffers from health problems that prevent pregnancy. But if she is satisfied About her children and glorifying God who blessed her with them, her vision expresses how happy she is to live in the embrace of her children and that they are the best offspring and she does not feel about them. They have no fatigue or inconvenience. If, after returning from work, her husband brings her a quantity of fish and it is alive, then he loves her very much and will do everything in his power to ensure a decent living for her and their children. Seeing the fish in the husband’s hand and giving it to his wife indicates that pleasant events will occur Soon the bond between the spouses will increase. One of the negatives of the dream is that if she sees grilled fish and begins to eat it, then she is about to get into a big problem that will be dealt with by people who hate her. Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin, the most important jurist and scholar of dream interpretation, said that the fish It indicates goodness and prosperity, and that there are many pleasant surprises that will happen to the viewer, and after that she will feel very happy, and this is if the fish appear in the water and are still alive. He also said: If a woman sees that she is chased and large in size, this is news of the fulfillment of a wish that is dear to her. Whether it belongs to her or to someone close to her. If an unknown person cuts off the head of a fish in front of the fortuneteller’s eyes, then the dream expresses a serious crisis that will befall him, and it may be a crisis between her and her husband that will take their lives to the brink of collapse, and this is due to a conspiracy by someone who hates them and does not like to see them happy. If a woman sees that her husband is sitting on The bank of the sweet Nile and he took out a beautiful and colorful fish from the inside and then gave it to her. Seeing it is evidence of the good condition of her children and that some of them have a great relationship in the future. It also expresses a woman’s efforts to make her family happy, even if it has been prepared for some time. Fish in a married woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying fish For a married woman: Seeing buying fish in a dream for a married woman indicates happiness and happiness

title: Interpretation of a dream about riding a plane in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a plane trip in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about riding a plane with someone. The plane is a modern means of transportation, and flying in the air is one of the miracles of God Almighty, and its symbol in the dream, based on the opinion of Ibn Sirin, is an indication of achieving. Ambitions and ambitions, and also symbolizes success and distinction in high positions, and today from the magazine through a cultural media magazine we will learn about the signs and symbols of the dream when we ride a single, married, pregnant, man and a new man. Follow us, dear readers. Interpretation of the dream of seeing riding a plane in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq believes Imam Al-Sadiq says that riding a plane in a dream is a sign of an upcoming trip. And that the vision may reflect the negative feelings and loneliness that the dreamer is experiencing, and God knows best. Flying a plane in a dream is a good thing and many positive changes that the dreamer’s life is going through. A plane crash or collapse It is one of the most unfortunate visions that bring a lot of sorrows and problems and can indicate disappointment and humiliation. Dream interpreters also presented seeing an airplane in a dream as being about the dreamer’s awareness and culture and his ability to overcome things and coexist with life in all its details. The dreamer can see himself looking at the airplane from His seat, and this is evidence of the freedom he obtains by God’s command, and his outlook on life can change. Riding a plane fulfills the hopes and dreams that the dreamer desires in reality, and he may also find a distinguished job. Kidnapping in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a prisoner of the past. Interpretation of a dream about seeing A plane trip in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin believes that an unmarried woman flying a plane in a dream is just a good marriage. The vision reflects the many positive changes that the girl goes through during this period. The plane ladder in a dream is a marriage to a man who has a lot of money and a prominent position that brings happiness. By the girl, and climbing the stairs can be good and his success in work or study. Interpretation of a dream about seeing riding a plane in a dream for a married woman. A married woman seeing a plane in a dream reflects many successes and dreams that she seeks with her husband. Riding a plane with her husband is abundant wealth that she can possess A married woman enjoys a happy life and psychological and family stability. The sound of an airplane for a married woman is considered one of the most praiseworthy visions for the disappearance of stress and problems that women suffer from during this period. Perhaps climbing in a dream during pregnancy for a married woman will give birth soon and easily. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an airplane traveling in a dream For a divorced woman, seeing a plane ride in a dream indicates difficult ambitions that await you. Perhaps the vision indicates success, advancement in jobs, and change in her life for the better. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a plane ride in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman flying a plane in a dream is a sign that her due date is approaching and that she will give birth. It will be easy. The vision also shows the safety of herself and her fetus. Interpretation of the dream of seeing riding a plane in a dream for a man. Seeing a plane in a man’s dream is interpreted through

title: Interpretation of a dream about a falcon: Seeing a falcon in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a falcon in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether she is old or young. Interpretation of a falcon in a dream: Imam Ibn Sirin said that seeing a falcon in a dream, whether big or small, symbolizes nourishment for male children, and seeing it indicates a high and sublime status. As well as victory over enemies, defeating opponents, achieving what is desired, and achieving victory. Money. Seeing a falcon in a dream, whether it is big or small, may indicate an unjust ruler who oppresses the people and the flock with his injustice, or an indication of death that befalls the fortuneteller, or imprisonment. And whoever sees a falcon in his dream, he sees that, it is considered good news and food for the dreamer, Or he is blessed with children, or he is blessed with money, or he is blessed with both. Whoever sees in his dream that a large or small hawk flies and follows the fortuneteller in the dream, the dream indicates the anger of a person with authority and prestige towards the fortuneteller in real life, which may cause harm and torment to the dreamer. Likewise, whoever sees a falcon in his dream, his vision shows the money, wealth, and spoils that the dreamer acquires in wakefulness. As for the one who seeks to achieve a specific goal in wakefulness, and sees in his dream a falcon, whether it is big or small, his vision indicates that he will reach his goal and achieve success. What he strives for. If a poor person sees a falcon in his dream, then his vision announces the end of his poverty and his condition will improve and he will be blessed with money, God willing. In general, seeing a falcon in a dream does not bode well in all cases, but in some cases it can indicate things that are abhorrent to a person, such as death. Or imprisonment or miserliness. Al-Saqr: Two things: one is a noble, honorable, unjust sultan, and the second is a noble son. Whoever sees a hawk following him, the brave man will become angry at him. On the authority of a man who came to Saeed bin Al-Musayyab and said: I saw a white dove on the balconies of the mosque, and I was amazed by its beauty, so a falcon came and carried it. Ibn Al-Musayyab said: If your dream is true, then marry Al-Hajjaj bint Abdullah bin Jaafar. He quickly married her, and they said to him: O Abu Muhammad, how did you get rid of her? He said: Because the dove is a woman, and the white one is pure in judgment, so I have not seen any woman with a better judgment than the daughter of the bird in Paradise, and I looked at the falcon, and it was an Arabian bird. I have never seen a falcon among the Arabs than Al-Hajjaj bin Yusuf. If you dream of a falcon, this foretells that cunning will deceive you in some way. If you dream that you are shooting a hawk, this foretells that you will overcome obstacles after a long struggle. Of her affairs. This dream also means that enemies are close to you and are ready to take advantage of your small mistakes. And if you can drive away a hawk before it harms your birds, you will be lucky in your business. If you dream of seeing a dead falcon, this indicates the defeat of your enemies. If you dream that you shoot a falcon, you will have a round with enemies and you will likely win. If you dream that you hear a falcon talking, this foretells that an old scandal will arise and hurt you because of your association with it. If you see a hawk hovering on a train track, it means that some accident or loss is about to befall you. If you see hawks flying far away and you are approaching them, this portends that you will be able to...

title: The most important meanings of interpretation of seeing berries in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing berries for a virgin girl? This means her close marriage to a man who will improve her relationship. What does it mean to see a girl picking berries from a tree to eat? It means livelihood and perhaps marriage. What is the interpretation of seeing cranberries? This means that she is pregnant with a boy. What does it mean to see berries Green? Enemies close to you could be your family or friends. Interpretation of a dream that you are picking berries from a tree? This means that good news is coming to you. Interpretation of seeing berries for single women. A virgin girl’s dream of berries means that she will soon marry a man who will treat her kindly. Berries in a dream for a man Sick means a speedy recovery and recovery in a short time. Then the berries mean the end of social problems in the girl’s life and the beginning of a good life with others. Then whether this cranberry is a sign of a strong, chivalrous youth, or indicates a pious and sober youth. If the girl dreams that she is picking Berries from trees to eat or collect in a bag, this means sustenance and perhaps marriage. A dream of berries for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing berries for a married woman means the good life she enjoys with others, whether it is her husband, her family, or her children. Also, if she is at the beginning of her life, the berries here mean birth Good and pious offspring, and this offspring will be a great reason for happy events in her life. Then the married woman was married for a long time and suffered from psychological problems, because the berries here mean patience. She must wait a little before she decides to end her married life or divorce, because what follows her in her life with her husband in Mostly, it is good and peaceful. Interpretation of a dream about green berries: A dream about green berries indicates the presence of enemies near you, perhaps from your family or friends. Then the interpretation of seeing green berries here for a married woman means that the due date is approaching, if she is pregnant. Then green berries mean the birth of both sexes, boys And girls, and it will be livelihood for your cute children. Then green berries symbolize religiosity and closeness to Almighty God. Green berries mean religiosity, and many good deeds. A dream about buying berries in a store means great success and religiosity in your life. Planting berries at a merchant means money and wealth. For the worker, it means his promotion and an increase in his salary. Seeing a dream about eating berries: Seeing eating berries in a dream and whether the man intends to open a new business or enter into new projects, then it means that his business is successful. It was said about berries that they are very food and perhaps a sign of marriage to a fair woman with a cheerful face and fair complexion, while if You dreamed that you were picking berries from trees, this means that happy news is on your way. Interpretation of a dream about berries for a pregnant woman: The gender of the baby varies according to the color of the berries. Eating red berries means the birth of a girl. Then the interpretation of seeing cranberries means that she is pregnant with a boy. Then the berries indicate an easy birth without pain and may mean a natural birth. Then the berries mean a woman’s devotion and loyalty to her husband, and it also means the goodness of her actions. Joy in a dream. See grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils In a dream, seeing raw fish, suicide in a dream, vomiting in a dream, feces in the

title: Interpretation of a dream about drowning: Seeing someone drowning in a dream

preview.html: A dream of drowning for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether in the sea, and surviving it, a child drowning, death, I dreamed of drowning saving someone. From drowning in a pool Ibn Sirin and others Interpretation of the sea in a dream Seeing the sea in a dream is one of the dreams that come to people a lot in general, and among them the calm sea is better in vision and interpretation than the raging sea as well as drowning, because in the sea only or the waters are raging in real life, but in the dream there is an interpretation of seeing drowning in any situation that a person sees for himself or for someone else with him, whether he drowned in salty, cloudy or clear water. Whoever sees himself in a sea or river and dies in this dream is tormented in the fire of Hell, or it is a sign of the corruption of his religion and class, and he must reconsider his religious testimony that he mixed with. Worldly things and the preference of this world over them. As for if this person was sick and saw that he drowned in a dream, then he will die from this illness or that disease. And if a person mingled with scholars and was righteous and swam in the sea and reached its water in the summer, and swam and drowned without dying, then he will drown in the bliss of this world of goodness, money and blessings, or he will become one of those present. Whoever sees himself diving into the sea or water and then drowns, this indicates his condemnation by the sultan or the person in charge. Whoever sees that he came out of the water and did not drown after fear, he returns to religion and righteousness, especially if he sees that he is wearing green clothes. Whoever dreams that he is drowning in clear, non-cloudy water, or sees the bottom and the ground under the clear water in which he is drowning, it is an abundance of money and its increase and his drowning in the money of the world, and whoever dies in that drowning in clear water, his enemy is plotting against him and striking him with his determination and harming him. And if the sleeper sees that he enters the sea in the cold or winter, and drowns in that atmosphere or cold, and feels terror or fear, he dies in his sleep, then his religion is corrupted, or he dies in disbelief. Or deceived by power and money in this world. Interpretation of drowning in a dream. Drowning in clear water and calm sea in a dream indicates drowning in the bliss of this world and the disorder of religion and in this world, and drowning in turbid waters and raging sea indicates a deadly danger that befalls the seer. Leaving the sea and water without drowning is evidence of justice and good condition. The patient drowning in the sea in a dream indicates his death. Drowning a dead person in a dream: If you see a dead person drowning in the sea or water, this indicates his bad condition and his exit from the sea without drowning is evidence of his good condition. Interpretation of drowning in a dream for a single person If an unmarried person sees in his dream that he is drowning, this is a sign of his strong attachment to worldly affairs and their adornment. He ignores his religion. Interpretation of drowning in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is drowning in the sea or in the sea or in water in general, this is a sign of her excessive interest in physical adornment at the expense of the soul, that is, she is. occupied before. By flaunting her charm and catching the men around her. Interpretation of drowning in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees in her dream

title: What is the symbol of a perfume bottle in a single woman’s dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bottle of perfume in a dream for a single girl. Also, seeing a bottle of perfume in a dream of an unmarried girl means that you will hear good news. And the girl who dreams is buying a beautiful bottle of perfume in a dream. This indicates that she is going through a period full of happiness and success in her life. And so is the vision of buying a bottle. An expensive perfume in one girl’s dream. It means that she will achieve her goals and excel in her studies or work. A girl watches herself buying a bottle of perfume with an attractive and refreshing scent in a dream. It is a metaphor for marrying a rich, handsome young man. Likewise, the girl who enters the store and buys perfume without hesitation or thinking about it. The dream. It is a metaphor for her ability to make decisions within a short period of time and to be right. Also, someone sees that he is trying to buy a bottle of perfume but hesitates to choose the man in the dream. This dream indicates that the dreamer is a hesitant and confused person in all aspects of her life. And if a girl dreams Seeing a cheap, foul-smelling perfume bottle in a dream. It is a sign of marriage to an ugly, disabled man, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing a perfume bottle in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a perfume bottle in a married woman’s dream. It indicates good morals. She has insight and everyone loves her. The appearance of perfume in a married woman’s dream and its smell is beautiful. It is a symbol of the peaceful life, love and affection between the mother and her husband. A woman who dreams that another woman smells perfume on her husband. It is a sign of the dreamer’s jealousy of her husband in reality. A woman sees herself She buys a bottle of perfume in a dream. It is a sign of getting rid of disputes with her husband. The vision also indicates a bright future for the dreamer’s children. The appearance of a woman spraying perfume with an attractive scent in a dream. It confirms the good and successful relationship between the spouses and the strength of understanding and bonding between them. A married woman dreams of spraying perfume on Her clothes and the smell was widespread and pleasant. It is a good omen for the appearance of pregnancy soon. Likewise, a woman who sees herself trying to close a perfume bottle in a dream, but is unable to do so. It is a sign of a problem and she was unable to control it in reality, and God knows best. As for the wife who She sees herself drinking from a bottle of perfume in a dream. It is a symbol of the purity, purity, and purity of her heart that distinguishes her from others. And seeing a woman whose husband gave her a bottle of perfume in a dream. It is a symbol of his intense love for her. Interpretation of seeing a perfume bottle in a dream about a man and its meaning. The appearance of a perfume bottle in a man’s dream is evidence On his success in personal and professional life. Seeing a perfume bottle in a man’s dream, and smelling the flowers. It is a sign that the dreamer has a calm and trouble-free life. It also indicates the peace of mind that he feels and makes him happy all the time. A man watches himself emptying a bottle Perfume in a dream. It is an unpleasant vision because it symbolizes that the dreamer is a frivolous person who does not care about his life, and God knows best. Seeing a perfume bottle with a distinctive scent and an international brand in a dream. This means that the fortuneteller is a special, elegant and attractive person to everyone. As for seeing a broken perfume bottle in a dream She is

title: Interpretation of a dream about prison for single women

preview.html: If an unmarried woman stays in prison for a long time, this is an indication that she went through great difficulties in her life during this time, so follow us to learn more through our translator. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is in prison and cannot get out From him. This is an indication of the many burdens and worries that she bears in her life. Either seeing an unmarried girl in a dream, who was looking forward to getting out of prison and was sad. The meaning indicates that he is going through bad circumstances now and is trying to get rid of them. Likewise, the dreaming girl is looking from afar at Prison in a dream. It indicates a big problem that he will keep this single girl away from her and will get rid of her, God willing. Even though the dreaming single girl stayed in prison for a long time. This is a sign that he is going through some problems and difficulties at the moment. And the inability to Solve it or get rid of it, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is in prison for a long time and she feels sorry for him in the dream. It indicates that her husband will have some problems at this time. From her life. What if the married woman who dreams looks at the prison from afar, and she is happy as long as she stays in her place in the dream. This is an indication that she has been liberated from all the problems she was going through in her life during this time. Or a married woman sees in a dream that she is imprisoned. In prison for a long time. It shows that she has reached a lot of bad things in her life during this time. Alternatively, seeing a married woman in a dream means that she is looking for a way out of prison and she is sad. It shows that she is going through some problems and issues at this time in her life Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a divorced woman: What if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is sitting in prison for a long time in a dream? This indicates that she is going through very bad circumstances at this time in her life. And that this matter saddens her greatly at this time, and God knows best. And if she is a divorced woman... She is looking for a way out of prison and did not find it, and she was very desperate in the dream. This indicates that she went through some exhaustion and difficult things, and God Almighty knows best. Or seeing a divorced woman in a dream going to prison and looking at him from afar. It shows that she will see some good things in her life. And they will be saved. It is sad, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Like a divorced dreamer who sits in prison and comes out of it easily. It shows the problems that you will face, but you will succeed in getting rid of them, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about prison for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that The prison is very narrow and in bad shape. It indicates that there is a big problem that he will be exposed to, and that he will not be able to get rid of it easily, and God is Most High. And seeing the dreamer in a dream searching for a way out of prison and feeling sorry. This is an indication of his freedom from the problem that plagued him during this time. Time, God willing. What if he looks?
